channel.title: RagingCoders
channel.description:
Very nice community and very nice non laggy server to work on. We have alot done and alot customized to our liking and would like more people to join so we can get this done a bit faster. Apply in this format:
[code]Name: Why you would like to join: Will you be faithful: Experience:[/code]
If you would like to join the site, here it is: http://www.ragingcoders.org/smf <= Administrator approved site.
I ask you at least know how to add spawns, shops and things like that.

item.title: RagingCoders
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Servers are better when the groups are kept smaller… I doubt you want a group of more then 3 or so, unless they’re either a) Very good at programming or b) They can work extremely well as a team (I’d say it’s reasonably hard to keep track of who’s doing what, and what methods/variable names each person is using. Oh, and while I’m speaking about that I’m sure you want people that follow standards and so on).

Read full topic
